alert.note: Alert for Carroll; Douglas; Haralson; Heard; Paulding; Polk (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 10 at 3:25AM EST by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of western Paulding, Haralson, Carroll, west central Douglas, Heard and southeastern Polk Counties through 400 AM EST ... At 324 AM EST, a line of strong thunderstorms was along a line extending from Oak Level to Trickem to Wadley, and moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...40 to 50 mph wind, pea sized hail and frequent cloud to ground lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Carrollton, Buchanan, Franklin, Villa Rica, Bremen, Temple, Rockmart, Tallapoosa, Bowdon, Mount Zion, Aragon, Waco, Ephesus, Centralhatchee, Braswell, Roopville, Yorkville, Seaton Lake, Clem, and Abilene. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 500 AM EST for northwestern Georgia. A Tornado Watch also remains in effect until 500 AM EST for north central and northwestern Georgia. A Tornado Watch also remains in effect until 900 AM EST for northwestern and west central Georgia.
